channel.title: One way to kill a man
channel.description:
1st things first, the man must be either very drunk or very stoned
place the palm of your hand on the bottem of ure nose, thats the spot you gotta hit
then get the guy or gal to stand still (this could be the tricky part)
and smake him as hard as you can with your hand flat and where you put it on your nose going upwards
if done properly and hard enough it will break the bone and push it in the brain, one way to kill a man.

item.title: One way to kill a man
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Who doesn’t know that? If you really want to make a tutorial, show as many ways as you can to kill a person.

Read full topic

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:5, topic:31366”]To give anyone a heart attack:

Grab ilyastor.

Put him on a 10 meter running track.

Make him run while eating celery.[/quote]

Hey man, stfu one minute your dissing the shit out of ilyao the next your loving him.

item.title: One way to kill a man
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

heres another way,

when you see the guy walking on the street, put your arm around his shoulder and pretend to know him, the guy will get really uncomfotable and probably wont notice as you walk him into the dark alley
next take out your shanker and give him two shanks in the chest, knock him on the floor which should hopefully stop him running around

but your ways also good, since you can do it indoors, and it probably wont end up in the newspaper
